channel.title: CVE Feed for Ovarro -- TBox
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ovarro -- TBox

item.title: CVE-2021-22646|2024-08-03T18:44:14.053Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: The “ipk” package containing the configuration created by TWinSoft can be uploaded, extracted, and executed in Ovarro TBox, allowing malicious code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-22650|2024-08-03T18:51:05.834Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: An attacker may use TWinSoft and a malicious source project file (TPG) to extract files on machine executing Ovarro TWinSoft, which could lead to code execution.

item.title: CVE-2021-22642|2024-08-03T18:44:14.047Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: An attacker could use specially crafted invalid Modbus frames to crash the Ovarro TBox system.

item.title: CVE-2021-22648|2024-08-03T18:51:05.863Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: Ovarro TBox proprietary Modbus file access functions allow attackers to read, alter, or delete the configuration file.

item.title: CVE-2021-22640|2024-08-03T18:44:14.240Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: An attacker can decrypt the Ovarro TBox login password by communication capture and brute force attacks.

item.title: CVE-2021-22644|2024-08-03T18:44:14.128Z -- ovarro -- tbox
item.description: Ovarro TBox TWinSoft uses the custom hardcoded user “TWinSoft” with a hardcoded key.
